definitions: in a deliberate and intentional way

examples.text: she consciously chose to ignore him
a vicious and consciously dishonest hatchet job

definitions: in a way that is directly perceptible to and under the control of the person concerned

examples.text: most players don't think consciously about a throw
we don't consciously perceive everything that happens to us

shortDefinitions: in way that is directly perceptible to and under control of person
